Jil Sander Lands in the GCC

 <https://onechalhoubmedia.connexionsnow.com/5d97e3e7f068b52599cabf4b5b2fac861485379375.gif> 	

Jil Sander opens its first-ever store in the GCC, now welcoming our luxury consumers at Mall of the Emirates, Dubai.
This debut marks a significant step in our strategic partnership with OTB Group, bringing the brand’s modern vision of luxury to the Middle East for the first time.
